title: Regulation (EEC) No 497/70 of the Commission of 17 March 1970 on rules for the application of export refunds on fruit and vegetables
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 497/70 OF THE COMMISSION  of 17 March 1970  on rules for the application of export refunds on fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The proof referred to in Article 1 (2) can be brought only by submitting a certificate issued by the  (1)OJ No 192, 27.10.1966, p. 3286/66. (2)OJ No L 318, 18.12.1969, p. 10. (3)OJ No 314, 23.12.1967, p. 9. (4)OJ No L 47, 28.2.1970, p. 53. (5)OJ No L 62, 18.3.1970, p. 11. (6)OJ No L 318, 18.12.1969, p. 1.
authorities of the producer Member State at the request of the interested parties.
In case of doubt regarding the authenticity of this certificate, the competent national authorities shall return the disputed document, or a photocopy of that document, to the issuing authority for the purpose of inspection. The same may apply in the case of random sampling.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 March 1970.
For the Commission
The President
Jean REY
